item.title: Green Chicken Chili
item.description: I derived this recipe from combining a couple of recipes: https://simpleasthatblog.com/instant-pot-green-chicken-chili/ https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/263617/chef-johns-green-chicken-chili/ We didn’t have chipotle powder on hand, so I used paprika as a substitute, and skipped the chile powder that was also mentioned to keep the heat down. I’d describe it as not spicy for anyone who normally enjoys spicy foods, and mild for those who are sensitive to it. If you want to make it spicy, using spicier green salsas, keeping the jalape√±o seeds, or using more/different peppers can all do that.
